the game will not show up on any of  my backup managers except gaia which will not launch it. Once you download the torrent do you have to put it in the ps3 directly or do something to it???? plz help

won't show up on backup manager plz help
do you have to do something to the torrent once its downloaded?

The exclamation marks mean "Missing Texture".  If you're seeing them, it means these mods are interfering with eachother, or another mod you already had installed.  The only way to fix this is to disable all the new mods you've installed, or disable them one by one to see which is giving you conflict.  If turning off all the mods does not work, then enjoy reinstalling your game.  Always remember, back up your save game files before installing new mods, and ALWAYS read the authors mod description first.
